en-US.name: Crazy Diamond Machine
en-US.summary: Adds a crazy diamond machine to the list of games you can play
en-US.description: This adds a crazy diamond machine featuring a wild diamond symbol to the list of games you can play

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: This will add Crazy Diamonds to the list slot machines you can play.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congratulations! You can now access Crazy Diamonds by saying select a new machine.

testingInstructions: After purchasing, Crazy Diamonds will show up in the list of games you can play when you say Select a new machine
